What are the best organic methods to control them?' }, { id: 2, title: 'Crop rotation techniques', author: 'Sarah Lee', replies: 7, time: '5 hours ago', content: 'Looking for advice on proper crop rotation to maintain soil health and prevent diseases.' }, { id: 3, title: 'Irrigation tips for droughts', author: 'Michael Brown', replies: 5, time: '1 day ago', content: 'With the current drought conditions, what are the most efficient irrigation methods?' }, { id: 4, title: 'Organic fertilizer recommendations', author: 'Emma Wilson', replies: 15, time: '2 days ago', content: 'Can anyone recommend good organic fertilizers for vegetable gardens?' }, { id: 5, title: 'Weather prediction tools', author: 'David Kim', replies: 9, time: '3 days ago', content: 'What weather apps or tools do you use for farming decisions?' } ].filter(topic => topic.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || topic.author.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ).map((topic, index) => (

A
Alice Johnson 1 hour ago

I've had great success with neem oil for aphid control. Spray in the evening to avoid harming beneficial insects.

R
Robert Chen 30 minutes ago

Companion planting with marigolds also helps deter aphids naturally.
